section1.title: # 1. Mission: Building a Mirror for Civilization
section1.p1: ASI (Artificial Super Intelligence) does not suddenly "appear" one day.
section1.p3: The result of two paths naturally converging at some point in the future.
section1.p4: When technology advances far faster than civilization matures, the world will enter a high-risk period.
section1.p5: The birth of Final Countdown for ASI is to enable the world to "see":
section1.highlight1: How close is technology to ASI?
section1.highlight2: How far is civilization from safely accommodating ASI?
section1.p9: but a scientific instrument needed globally.

section2.title: # 2. ASI Birth Monitoring Dashboard
section2.p1: The world's first scientific monitoring system that dynamically quantifies superintelligence risk using Technology Maturity Ã— Civilization Maturity dual-axis metrics.
section2.subtitle: ## 2.1 Dual-Axis Core Model Technology Ã— Civilization
section2.techItem4: Infrastructure such as power, networks, and data centers
section2.techItem5: Integration speed between autonomous agents (AI Agents)
section2.techNote: Indicates the estimated time for global technology to naturally reach ASI.
section2.civItem5: Global attitudes toward AI and cultural resilience
section2.civNote: Indicates the estimated time for civilization to "safely accommodate ASI."

section3.title: # 3. Five-Factor Civilization Model
section3.p1: All ASI Birth Countdown assessments are based on five core indicators:
section3.item1Desc: Global tone, emotions, narrative atmosphere, and psychological acceptance of AI.
section3.item2Desc: Compute power, model efficiency, quantum progress, and hardware supply chain resilience.
section3.item3Desc: Power, energy storage, networks, satellite constellations, data centers, IoT and robotics infrastructure.
section3.item4Desc: Cross-domain integration, AI toolchains, and autonomous agent (Agents) penetration.
section3.item5Desc: Human Cognitive Maturity: mental maturity, collective value consensus, and civilizational resilience.

section4.title: # 4. Algorithm Philosophy (Formula Not Public)
section4.p1: To prevent algorithms from being weaponized, reverse-engineered, or misunderstood, we do not publish complete mathematical formulas and parameters.
section4.p2: But we publish the computational spirit:
section4.techDesc: Uses Linear Growth Model to reflect predictable, cumulative technological progress.
section4.civDesc: Uses S-Curve civilization model to reflect humanity's natural growth characteristics from "slow â†’ accelerated â†’ stable."
section4.p4: We publish the direction, but not the reverse-engineerable confidential algorithms.

section5.title: # 5. Risk Delta Technology â€“ Civilization
section5.highlight: Technology advancement speed minus Civilization maturity speed
section5.p2: Used to identify the risk level the world is at:
section5.danger: Danger Zone (High Risk Period): Technology is far ahead of civilization.
section5.tension: Tension Zone (Tension Period): The two are close.
section5.safe: Safe Zone (Safe Period): Civilization has caught up with technology.
section5.p3: Risk Delta is not a threat, but a scientific warning light needed by civilization.

section6.title: # 6. Global Partner Initiative
section6.p1: To build a truly reliable superintelligence countdown system, no single country or institution can do it alone.
section6.item3: International policy and governance model participation
section6.item4: Scientific input from large research institutions
section6.item5: Influential media and narrative monitoring networks
section6.item6: Long-term resources, talent, and funding support
section6.p3: Therefore, we launched the Global Community Initiative:
section6.highlight: Inviting researchers, engineers, educators, policymakers, technology companies, international organizations, and public welfare foundations to build a civilization-level prediction system together.
section6.p4: The more people participate, the stronger the model, the more accurate the countdown, and the safer civilization becomes.

section7.title: # 7. This is Not Just a Technology Project, But a Civilization Engineering
section7.highlight: Technology is the thrust, civilization is the direction.
section7.p5: The birth of ASI is not fate, but a collective human choice.

section8.title: # 8. Join Us Join the Global Effort
section8.p2: Welcome to become part of the Final Countdown Global Partner Network.
section8.highlight: The countdown to superintelligence is underway, but we can still shape the outcome together.
